item.title: CVE-2023-7153|2024-08-02T08:50:08.311Z -- macroturk%20software%20and%20internet%20technologies -- macro-bel
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Macroturk Software and Internet Technologies Macro-Bel allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Macro-Bel: before V.1.0.1.
